title: 2019 Shute Shield season
text:
The 2019 Shute Shield season is 146th season of a premier <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> competition in Sydney and the 97th season of the <a href="Shute%20Shield">Shute Shield</a>. The 2019 season is featuring 11 teams, following <a href="Penrith%20Emus%20Rugby">Penrith</a>'s cutting from the competition in 2018. The premiers were <a href="Sydney%20Uni%20Football%20Club">Sydney University</a>, defeating <a href="Warringah%20Rugby%20Club">Warringah</a> by 5 points in the grand final, held at <a href="Western%20Sydney%20Stadium">Bankwest Stadium</a>.
Competition format.
The 2019 Shute Shield season will be played across 18 rounds, with each team playing each other once and eight other teams twice in a home and away format. This will be followed by a six-team play-off post season, culminating with a grand final on 24 August.
